components/common/breadcrumbs:

    • {{/each}} {{/unless}}

  • {{lang 'gift_certificate.purchase.heading'}}

  • {{lang 'gift_certificate.redeem.heading'}}

layout/base:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html class="no-js" lang="{{ locale_name }}">
    <head>
        <title>{{ head.title }}</title>
        {{{ resourceHints }}}
        {{{ head.meta_tags }}}
        {{{ head.config }}}
        {{#block "head"}} {{/block}}

        <link href="{{ head.favicon }}" rel="shortcut icon">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1">

        <script>
            {{!-- Change document class from no-js to js so we can detect this in css --}}
            document.documentElement.className = document.documentElement.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        </script>
        {{!-- Load Lazysizes script ASAP so images will appear --}}
        <script>
            {{!-- Only load visible elements until the onload event fires, after which preload nearby elements. --}}
            window.lazySizesConfig = window.lazySizesConfig || {};
            window.lazySizesConfig.loadMode = 1;
        </script>
        <script async src="{{cdn 'assets/dist/theme-bundle.head_async.js'}}"></script>
        <script type="text/javascript" src="//cdn.rlets.com/capture_configs/b1b/757/ca8/cc54d43804c2de81bc18a03.js" async="async"></script>

        {{ getFontsCollection }}
        {{{stylesheet '/assets/css/theme.css'}}}
        <style type="text/css" media="screen, print">
            @font-face {
            font-family: 'ProximaNova';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 100;
            font-display: swap;
            src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Thin.woff2'}}") format('woff2'),
                 url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Thin.woff'}}") format('woff');
            }
            @font-face {
            font-family: 'ProximaNova';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 400;
            font-display: swap;
            src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Regular.woff2'}}") format('woff2'),
                 url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Regular.woff'}}") format('woff');
            }
            @font-face {
            font-family: 'ProximaNova';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-display: swap;
            src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Bold.woff2'}}") format('woff2'),
                 url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Bold.woff'}}") format('woff');
            }
            @font-face {
            font-family: 'ProximaNova';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 800;
            font-display: swap;
            src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Extrabold.woff2'}}") format('woff2'),
                 url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Extrabold.woff'}}") format('woff');
            }
            @font-face {
            font-family: 'ProximaNova';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 900;
            font-display: swap;
            src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Black.woff2'}}") format('woff2'),
                 url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Black.woff'}}") format('woff');
            }
            @font-face {
            font-family: 'ProximaNova';
            font-style: italic;
            font-weight: 100;
            font-display: swap;
            src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Alt-Thin.woff2'}}") format('woff2'),
                 url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Alt-Thin.woff'}}") format('woff');
            }
            @font-face {
            font-family: 'ProximaNova';
            font-style: italic;
            font-weight: 300;

            }
            @font-face {

            font-style: italic;

        <script src="https://kit.fontawesome.com/c2b0ed3023.js" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>

    	<style type="text/css">
        .white {
          color: #fff;
        }
        
        .black {
          color: #000;
        }
        
        .blue {
          color: #002E6D;
        }
        
        .red {
          color: #ED1C24;
        }
        
        .bg-black {
          background-color: #000;
        }
        
        .bg-white {
          background-color: #fff;
        }
        
        .bg-blue {
          background-color: #002E6D;
        }
        
        .bg-red {
          background-color: #ED1C24;
        }
        
        .bg-light-grey {
          background-color: #F9F9F9;
        }
        
        .bg-grey {
          background-color: #C8C8C8;
        }
        
        .bd-grey {
          border: 1px solid #C8C8C8;
        }
        
        body, p, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
          color: #000;
        }
        
        body {
          font-family: "ProximaNova", sans-serif;
        }
        body p, body h1, body h2, body h3, body h4, body h5, body h6 {
          font-family: "ProximaNova", sans-serif;
        }
        
        body h1, body h2, body h3, body h4, body h5, body h6 {
          letter-spacing: 0;
        }
        body h1, body .h1 {
          font-size: 28px;
          font-weight: 900;
          line-height: 32px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          body h1, body .h1 {
            font-size: 54px;
            line-height: 66px;
          }
        }
        body h2, body .h2, body .facet-quick-heading {
          font-size: 22px;
          line-height: 26px;
          font-weight: 600;
          margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          body h2, body .h2, body .facet-quick-heading {
            font-size: 36px;
            line-height: 44px;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
          }
        }
        body h3, body .h3 {
          font-size: 20px;
          font-weight: 900;
          line-height: 32px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          body h3, body .h3 {
            font-size: 26px;
            line-height: 32px;
          }
        }
        body h4, body .h4 {
          font-size: 14px;
          font-weight: 700;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          body h4, body .h4 {
            font-size: 18px;
          }
        }
        body h5, body .h5 {
          font-size: 16px;
          font-weight: 700;
          text-transform: none;
        }
        body p {
          font-size: 14px;
          font-weight: 400;
          line-height: 29px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          body p {
            font-size: 16px;
          }
        }
        
        .xl {
          font-size: 16px;
          font-weight: 400;
          line-height: 28px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          .xl {
            font-size: 22px;
            line-height: 32px;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
          }
        }
        
        .lg {
          font-size: 16px;
          font-weight: 400;
          line-height: 28px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          .lg {
            font-size: 18px;
            line-height: 32px;
          }
        }
        
        .sm {
          font-size: 14px;
          font-weight: 400;
          line-height: 20px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          .sm {
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 20px;
          }
        }
        
        .eleven {
          font-size: 11px;
        }
        
        a {
          color: #ED1C24;
        }
        
        .button--primary {
          border-radius: 27px;
          padding: 1.1rem 2.25rem;
          margin-bottom: 0;
          border: 0px solid transparent;
        }
        .button--primary:hover {
          text-decoration: none;
        }
        .button--blue {
            background-color: #002E6D;
        }
        .login-wrapper .button {
            width: 100%;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 576px) {
          .login-wrapper .button {
            width: auto;
          }  
        }
        .button--large {
          font-size: 12px;
          font-weight: 700;
          text-transform: uppercase;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 768px) {
          .button--large {
            font-size: 14px;
          }
        }
        
        .button-sm-radius {
          border-radius: 4px;
        }
        
        .button-full-width {
          width: 100%;
        }
        .button-login-to-order {
            font-size: 12px;
            padding: .75rem 1.25rem;
        }
        .button-login-to-order {
            border: 0px solid transparent;
        }
        .productView-options .button--primary {
          border-radius: 27px;
          width: 100%;
          font-weight: 700;
          text-transform: uppercase;
        }
        .productView-options form[data-cart-item-add] {
            margin-bottom: 0;
        }
        
        .form-wishlist .button {
          border-radius: 4px;
          width: 100%;
          color: #000;
        }
        
        .form-prefixPostfix .button {
          height: auto;
        }
        
        .form-input {
          height: 53.19px;
        }
        
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .navPages .dropdown, .navPages .navPages-item {
            left: 0;
            position: relative;
          }
          .navPages .dropdown .navPages-action-moreIcon, .navPages .navPages-item .navPages-action-moreIcon {
            transform: rotate(-90deg);
          }
          .navPages .dropdown .nav-link, .navPages .navPages-item .nav-link {
            padding: 1.25rem 0.5rem;
          }
          .navPages .dropdown .dropdown-menu, .navPages .navPages-item .dropdown-menu {
            border: 1px solid #C8C8C8;
            min-width: fit-content;
            margin: 0;
            border-top-left-radius: 0;
            border-top-right-radius: 0;
          }
          .navPages .dropdown .dropdown-item, .navPages .navPages-item .dropdown-item {
            color: #000;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 14px;
          }
          .navPages .dropdown .dropdown-item:focus, .navPages .dropdown .dropdown-item:hover, .navPages .navPages-item .dropdown-item:focus, .navPages .navPages-item .dropdown-item:hover {
            background-color: transparent;
            color: #ED1C24;
          }
          .navPages .dropdown .navPages-action:hover, .navPages .navPages-item .navPages-action:hover {
            color: #ED1C24;
          }
          .navPages .dropdown .navPages-action.activePage, .navPages .dropdown .navPages-action:focus, .navPages .navPages-item .navPages-action.activePage, .navPages .navPages-item .navPages-action:focus {
            color: #000;
          }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          .navPages .dropdown .nav-link, .navPages .navPages-item .nav-link {
            padding: 1.25rem 1rem;
          }
          .navPages .navPages-item:first-child .nav-link {
            padding-left: 0;
          }
          .navPages .navPages-item:last-child .nav-link {
            padding-right: 0;
          }
        }
        
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .navPages .show .navPages-action-moreIcon {
            transform: rotate(0);
          }
        }
        
        .dropdown-toggle::after {
          content: none;
        }
        
        .heroCarousel-content {
          background-color: #002E6D;
          margin: 0;
          text-align: left;
          width: 100%;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .heroCarousel-content {
            background-color: transparent;
          }
        }
        
        .navUser {
          padding: 0;
        }
        
        .navUser-action, .navPages-action {
          text-transform: none;
          font-size: 14px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .navUser-action, .navPages-action {
            font-size: 12px;
          }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          .navUser-action, .navPages-action {

          }
          .navPages .dropdown .nav-link, .navPages .navPages-item .nav-link {
            padding: 1.25rem .75rem;
          }
          .navUser-action {

          }

        @media only screen and (min-width: 1200px) {
          .navUser-action {
            padding: 1rem .5rem;

          .navUser-action, .navPages-action {
            font-size: 14px;
          }
        }
        .navUser-action:hover, .navPages-action:hover {
          text-decoration: none;
        }
        
        .navPages {
          margin: 0;
          text-align: left;
        }

        .b-black {

        .border-radius {

        ol, ul {
          margin-left: 20px;
        }
        
        .image-separator .img {
          height: 240px;
          background-repeat: no-repeat;
          background-position: center;
          background-size: cover;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 768px) {
          .image-separator .img {
            height: 340px;
          }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          .image-separator .img {
            height: 440px;
          }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 1200px) {
          .image-separator .img {
            height: 540px;
          }
        }
        
        .branding .logo {
          position: relative;
          z-index: 20;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .branding .header-logo-image {
            margin: auto 0;
          }
        }
        .branding .form-input {
          border-radius: 22px;
          color: #000;
          border-color: #C8C8C8;
          font-size: 14px;
          height: auto;
        }
        .branding .form i {
          position: absolute;
          top: 16px;
          right: 30px;
          color: #C8C8C8;
        }
        
        .header-logo--left .header-logo-image {

        .mobile-nav {
          border-bottom: 1px solid #C8C8C8;

        .header {

        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .header {

        }
        .header .header-logo {

        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .header .header-logo {
            text-align: left;

        }
        .header .header-logo > a {
          width: 70%;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 551px) {
          .header .header-logo > a {
            padding: 0.68rem 0;
          }
        }
        
        .nav-top {
          border-bottom: 0 solid transparent;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .nav-top {
            border-top: 1px solid #C8C8C8;

        .nav-top .navPages-container .navPages-list .navPages-action {
          padding: 1.2rem 1.25rem 1.2rem;
        }
        .nav-top .navPages-container .navPages-list li:first-child a {
          padding-left: 0;

        .navPages-action:hover, .navPages-action.activePage {

        .heroCarousel {
          margin-top: 0;
          margin-bottom: 0;

        .heroCarousel .heroCarousel-content {

          height: 260px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .heroCarousel .heroCarousel-content {
            height: auto;
          }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
            .heroCarousel .heroCarousel-image-wrapper:after {
              background-color: #202020;
              content: "";
              display: block;
              position: absolute;
              top: 0;
              left: 0;
              width: 100%;
              height: 100%;
              z-index: 0;
              opacity: 0.4;
            }
        }
        .heroCarousel .slick-dots li {
          background-color: transparent;
        }
        
        .slick-dotted.slick-slider {
          margin-bottom: 0;
        }
        
        .featured-categories .category {
          height: 157.5px;
          padding: 15px;
          margin-top: 15px;
          margin-bottom: 15px;
          text-align: center;
          box-shadow: 0 4px 10px 0 rgba(35, 46, 105, 0.1);
          background-color: #fff;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 576px) {
          .featured-categories .category {
            height: 240px;
          }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 768px) {
          .featured-categories .category {
            height: 210px;
          }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 1200px) {
          .featured-categories .category {
            height: 255px;
          }
        }

          text-decoration: none;
        }
        .featured-categories .category img {

        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 576px) {
          .featured-categories .category img {

        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {

        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 1200px) {
          .featured-categories .category img {
            max-height: 130px;
          }
        }
        .featured-categories .category .reg {
          line-height: 20px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          .featured-categories .category .reg {
            line-height: 22px;
          }
        }
        
        .featured-partners .partner {
          height: 157.5px;
          padding: 15px;
          margin-top: 15px;
          margin-bottom: 15px;
          text-align: center;
          box-shadow: 0 4px 10px 0 rgba(35, 46, 105, 0.1);
          background-color: #fff;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 576px) {
          .featured-partners .partner {
            height: 240px;
          }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 768px) {
          .featured-partners .partner {
            height: 210px;
            padding: 30px;
          }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 1200px) {
          .featured-partners .partner {
            height: 255px;
          }
        }
        .featured-partners .partner img {
          max-height: 100px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 576px) {
          .featured-partners .partner img {
            max-height: 160px;
          }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 768px) {
          .featured-partners .partner img {
            max-height: 130px;
          }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 1200px) {
          .featured-partners .partner img {
            max-height: 100%;
          }
        }
        
        .become-a-customer {
          background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 46, 109, 0.9), rgba(0, 46, 109, 0.9)), url(https://cdn11.bigcommerce.com/s-tvpg77x4p0/product_images/uploaded_images/become-a-ddp-customer.jpg?t=1597866613);
          background-size: cover;
          background-position: center center;
          background-repeat: no-repeat;
        }
        
        .review-slider .carousel-inner {
          box-shadow: 0 4px 10px 0 rgba(35, 46, 105, 0.1);
        }
        .review-slider .carousel-inner .content {
          height: 360px;
        }
        .review-slider .carousel-control-next, .review-slider .carousel-control-prev {
          width: auto;
        }
        .review-slider .carousel-control-next-icon, .review-slider .carousel-control-prev-icon {
          background-color: #C8C8C8;
          background-image: none;
          padding-top: 13px;
          padding-bottom: 13px;
          border-radius: 50px;
          height: 50px;
          width: 50px;
        }
        .review-slider .carousel-control-next-icon {
          padding-left: 5px;
        }
        .review-slider .fa-star {
          color: #F9BA00;
        }
        
        .latest-news .date {
          color: #ED1C24;
          font-size: 11px;
          line-height: 14px;
          font-weight: 900;
          text-transform: uppercase;
        }
        .latest-news .news-item {
          border-bottom: 1px solid #C8C8C8;
          padding-bottom: 25px;
          margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        .latest-news .news-item p.xl {
          margin-bottom: 0;
        }
        
        .footer {
          border-top: 1px solid #000;
        }
        .footer h5, .footer p, .footer a {
          color: #fff;
        }
        .footer a:hover {
          text-decoration: none;
        }
        .footer .footer-copyright > .powered-by {
          color: #fff;
        }
        
        #faceted-search-container .sidebarBlock-heading {
          font-size: 18px;
          font-weight: 400;
          line-height: 22px;
        }
        #faceted-search-container .navList-action, #faceted-search-container .navList-action--checkbox {
          color: #000;
          font-size: 14px;
          font-weight: 400;
        }
        #faceted-search-container .navList:last-child {
          margin-bottom: 0;
        }
        
        .accordion--navList .accordion-title, #faceted-search-container .sidebarBlock-heading {
          font-weight: 700;
        }
        
        .productGrid .product {
          width: 100%;
          display: block;
          border-bottom: 1px solid #C8C8C8;
          margin-bottom: 15px;
          padding-bottom: 15px;
          padding-left: 0;
          padding-right: 0;
        }
        .productGrid .product .card {
          border: 0px solid transparent;
          border-radius: 0;
          margin: 0;
        }
        .productGrid .product .card .card-img-container {
          height: 120px;
        }
        .productGrid .product .card .card-title {
          color: #000;
          font-weight: 400;
          font-size: 16px;
        }
        
        .card-body .sku {
          font-weight: 400;
          color: #636569;
        }
        
        .actionBar {
          border-bottom: 1px solid #C8C8C8;
          margin-bottom: 0;
        }
        
        .col-lg-3 .actionBar {
            border: 0 solid transparent;
            margin: 0;
        }
        
        .actionBar-section .form-field {
          border: 1px solid #C8C8C8;
          margin-bottom: 0;
        }
        
        .sf {
            border: 1px solid #C8C8C8;
        }
        
        .actionBar-section .form-label {
          font-weight: 400;
        }
        
        .actionBar-section .form-select {
          color: #000;
          font-weight: 400;
        }
        
        .pagination-item.pagination-item--current {
          border-color: #C8C8C8;
        }
        
        li.pagination-item--current a, li.pagination-item--current button, .pagination-list li a, .pagination-list li button, .pagination-item.pagination-item--previous > a, .pagination-item.pagination-item--next > a {
          color: #000;
          font-size: 14px;
          font-weight: 400;
        }
        
        .productView {
          margin: 0;
          width: 100%;
          padding: 0;
        }
        .productView .sku {
          font-weight: 400;
          color: #636569;
        }
        .productView .productView-images, .productView .productView-description, .productView .productView-details {
          clear: none;
          float: none;
          width: 100%;
          padding: 0;
          margin: 0;
        }
        .productView .productView-description .tabs-contents {
          margin-bottom: 0;
        }
        .productView .productView-product {
          border-bottom: 0px solid transparent;
          padding-bottom: 0;
        }
        .productView .form-wishlist {
          margin-top: 0;
        }
        .productView .productView-options .form-action, .productView .productView-options .form-action .button {
          width: 100%;
          margin-right: 0;
          margin-bottom: 0;
          margin-top: 0;
        }
        .productView .productView-price {
          font-size: 16px;
          line-height: 24px;
          font-weight: 400;
          margin-bottom: 0;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          .productView .productView-price {
            font-size: 26px;
            line-height: 30px;
          }
        }
        .productView .productView-info {
          margin-bottom: 0;
        }
        .productView .productView-options {
          margin-bottom: 0;
        }
        .productView .form {
          margin: 0;
        }
        .productView .form-label--alternate {
          font-size: 16px;
          font-weight: 400;
        }
        .productView .productView-info-bulkPricing:empty {
          display: none;
        }
        .productView .productView-options .form-field {
          margin-bottom: 0;
        }
        .productView .bd-grey hr {
          margin-top: 0;
          margin-bottom: 0;
          border-top: 1px solid #C8C8C8;
        }
        
        .productGrid {
          margin: 0;
        }
        .productGrid li:first-child {
          margin-top: 15px;
        }
        
        .navBar--sub {
          margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }
        
        .navBar--sub .navBar-item {
          font-size: 14px;
          font-weight: 400;
        }
        .navBar--sub .navBar-item:first-child {
          margin-left: 0;
        }
        .navBar--sub .navBar-item .toggleLink-text {
          font-size: 14px;
          font-weight: 400;
        }
        
        .navBar--sub .navBar-action {
          font-size: 14px;
          font-weight: 400;
        }
        
        .navBar--sub .navBar-item.navBar-item--separate {
          border-left: 0px solid transparent;
          padding-left: 0;
        }
        
        .search .page-sidebar {
          clear: none;
          float: none;
          width: 100%;
          padding: 0;
          margin: 0;
        }
        .search .facetedSearch-refineFilters {
          font-size: 14px;
          font-weight: 400;
        }
        .search .sidebarBlock-heading {
          font-size: 18px;
          font-weight: 400;
        }
        
        .blog-template img {
          border-radius: 12px;
        }
        .blog-template hr {
          margin-top: 30px;
          margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        
        .blog-post-body {
          width: 100%;
          text-align: left;
        }
        .blog-post-body .blog-date {
          font-size: 11px;
          text-align: left;
        }
        .blog-post-body .h3 a {
          color: #000;
          font-weight: 400;
        }
        .blog-post-body .blog-post {
          font-size: 16px;
          line-height: 29px;
          font-weight: 400;
        }
        
        .post-template .blog-date {
          font-size: 18px;
        }
        
        .heroCarousel-content {
          /* padding: 3rem 0; */
          /* text-align: center; */
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .heroCarousel-content {
            padding: 0;
            text-align: left;
          }
        }
        
        .heroCarousel-action {
          margin-top: 1rem;
        }
        
        .maintenanceNotice {
          display: none !important;
        }
        
        #wishlist-dropdown.is-open {
          top: 46px !important;
          z-index: 89 !important;
          border: 0px solid transparent !important;
          border-radius: 0 !important;
          float: none !important;
          min-width: auto !important;
          padding: 0 !important;
          margin: 0 !important;
        }
        
        .form-row {
          margin: 0 -10px;
        }
        
        .socialLinks .icon svg {
          fill: #fff;
        }
        
        .blog + .blog {
          padding-top: 0;
          margin-top: 0;
          border-top: 0px solid transparent;
        }
        
        .subscribe-form input[type=email] {
          height: 45px;
          padding-left: 15px;
          width: 100%;
          color: #000;
        }
        .subscribe-form input[type=email]::placeholder {
          color: #000 !important;
          opacity: 1;
          text-transform: uppercase;
        }
        
        .arrow-send {
          position: relative;
          display: -webkit-box;
          display: -ms-flexbox;
          display: flex;
          -webkit-box-align: center;
          -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
          -webkit-box-pack: center;
          -ms-flex-pack: center;
          justify-content: center;
          text-align: center;
          height: 45px;
          width: 45px;
          background: #000;
          border-radius: 4px;
          overflow: hidden;
          color: transparent;
          border: 0px solid transparent;
          transition: none;
        }
        .arrow-send:before {
          content: "";
          font-family: FontAwesome;
          color: #fff;
          font-size: 14px;
          font-weight: 600;
          transition: all 0.4s ease;
          height: 15px;
          position: absolute;
          top: 12px;
          left: 15px;
          width: 15px;
        }
        .arrow-send:hover:before {
          left: 50px;
        }
        .arrow-send:after {
          content: "";
          font-family: FontAwesome;
          color: #fff;
          font-size: 14px;
          font-weight: 600;
          transition: all 0.4s;
          height: 15px;
          position: absolute;
          top: 12px;
          right: 50px;
          width: 15px;
        }
        .arrow-send:hover:after {
          right: 15px;
        }
        
        .modal {
          left: 50%;
          height: auto;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          .modal {
            width: 900px;
          }
        }
        
        .breadcrumbs {
          text-align: left;
          margin-top: 40px;
          margin-bottom: 0;
        }
        .breadcrumbs .breadcrumbs {
          margin-bottom: 0;
          margin-top: 0;
        }
        .breadcrumbs .breadcrumb {
          display: inline-block;
          margin-bottom: 0;
          background-color: transparent;
          border-radius: 0;
          padding: 0;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
            .previewCartCheckout {
                width: 40%;
            }
            .previewCart .productView {
                width: 60%;
            }
            .previewCart .productView-image {
                display: block;
            }
            .previewCart .productView-title {
                font-size: 20px;
            }
            .previewCart .productView .productView-price {
                font-size: 16px;
                line-height: 20px;
            }
        }
        .branding .form-input::placeholder {
            color: #000;
        }
        .img-hero {
            width: 100%;
            height: 414px;
            -o-object-fit: cover;
            object-fit: cover;
            -o-object-position: 50% 0;
            object-position: 50% 0;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 578px) {
            .heroCarousel-slide .heroCarousel-image-wrapper {
                max-height: 18.5rem;
            }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 798px) {
            .heroCarousel-slide .heroCarousel-image-wrapper {
                max-height: 23.5rem;
            }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
            .heroCarousel-slide .heroCarousel-image-wrapper {
                max-height: 20.5rem;
            }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 1200px) {
            .heroCarousel-slide .heroCarousel-image-wrapper {
                max-height: 24.5rem;
            }
        }
        .card .form-increment .cart-button, .card .form-increment {
            display: none !important;
        }
        </style>

        {{{head.scripts}}}

        {{~inject 'themeSettings' theme_settings}}
        {{~inject 'genericError' (lang 'common.generic_error')}}
        {{~inject 'maintenanceMode' settings.maintenance}}
        {{~inject 'urls' urls}}
        {{~inject 'secureBaseUrl' settings.secure_base_url}}
        {{~inject 'cartId' cart_id}}
        {{~inject 'template' template}}
 
        {{~inject "customer" customer}}
        {{~inject 'store_hash' settings.store_hash}}
        {{inject "b2bSettings" settings}}

        {{!-- BundleB2B --}}
        {{~inject "customer" customer}}
        {{~inject 'store_hash' settings.store_hash}}
        {{~inject "settings" settings}}
        {{~inject "page_type" page_type}}
        {{~inject "currency_selector" currency_selector}}
        {{!-- BundleB2B --}}

        {{!-- Four13 injected vars --}}
        {{inject 'storefrontApiToken' settings.storefront_api.token}}
        {{inject 'bcCustomerGroupName' customer.customer_group_name}}
        {{inject 'defaultImageURL' (cdn 'assets/img/ProductDefault.gif')}}
        {{!-- Four13 injected vars --}}
    </head>
    <body>
        <svg data-src="{{cdn 'img/icon-sprite.svg'}}" class="icons-svg-sprite"></svg>

        {{~#and settings.privacy_cookie settings.is_eu_ip_address}}
            {{> components/common/cookie}}
        {{/and}}

        {{> components/common/header }}
        {{> components/common/body }}
        {{> components/common/footer }}
        <script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.5.1.slim.min.js" integrity="sha384-DfXdz2htPH0lsSSs5nCTpuj/zy4C+OGpamoFVy38MVBnE+IbbVYUew+OrCXaRkfj" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
        <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/popper.js@1.16.1/dist/umd/popper.min.js" integrity="sha384-9/reFTGAW83EW2RDu2S0VKaIzap3H66lZH81PoYlFhbGU+6BZp6G7niu735Sk7lN" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
        <script src="https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.5.2/js/bootstrap.min.js" integrity="sha384-B4gt1jrGC7Jh4AgTPSdUtOBvfO8shuf57BaghqFfPlYxofvL8/KUEfYiJOMMV+rV" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>

        <script>window.__webpack_public_path__ = "{{cdn 'assets/dist/'}}";</script>
        <script src="{{cdn 'assets/dist/theme-bundle.main.js'}}"></script>
        <script>
            {{!-- Exported in app.js --}}
            window.stencilBootstrap("{{page_type}}", {{jsContext}}).load();

            {{!-- BundleB2B --}}
            window.jsContext = JSON.parse({{jsContext}})
            {{!-- BundleB2B --}}
        </script>

        {{{footer.scripts}}}
        <script>(function(d){var s = d.createElement("script");s.setAttribute("data-account", "m0wWZrPcxi");s.setAttribute("src", "https://cdn.userway.org/widget.js");(d.body || d.head).appendChild(s);})(document)</script>
    </body>
</html>

{{!-- BundleB2B --}}
<script>
    const inPages = () => {
        const urlArray = [          
            '/buy-again/',
            '/address-book/',
            '/create-quote/',
            '/quote-detail/',
            '/quote/',
            '/quote-edit/',
            '/quote-list/',
            '/quotes-list/',
            '/dashboard/',
            '/order-detail/',
            '/quick-order-pad/',
            '/shopping-list/',
            '/shopping-lists/',
            '/user-management/',
            '/invoices/',
            '/invoice-payment/',
            '/invoice-details/',
            '/invoice-payment-receipt/',
            '/account.php',
        ];
        const current = window.location.pathname;
        return urlArray.includes(current);
    };
    if(!inPages()) {
        document.querySelector('.body').style.display = "block";
    }
    if(inPages()) {
        const style = document.createElement('style');
        style.innerHTML = `
            .navBar.navBar--sub.navBar--account {
                display: block !important;
            }
        `;
        document.querySelector('head').append(style);
    }
</script>
{{!-- BundleB2B --}}

Back to Top

DDP Medical Supply offers wholesale medical supplies and equipment, sales and distribution in a reliable and timely fashion to durable medical equipment companies (DME), pharmaceutical retailers, physician offices and surgical centers.

DDP Medical equipment wholesale has been partnering with the medical community within the USA for over 20 years. Areas of expertise include wholesale diabetic supplies wholesale CGM, as well as being a medical surgical supplier, urology supplier and wound care supplier.
